description: Electromagnetism is a branch of Physics that deals with the electromagnetic force that occurs between electrically charged particles. The electromagnetic force is one of the four fundamental forces and exhibits electromagnetic fields such as magnetic fields, electric fields, and light. In this major, we will be learning Electromagnetic Induction, Alternating current, and Electromagnetic waves.
